code: @Override public RestChannelConsumer innerPrepareRequest(RestRequest request, NodeClient client) throws IOException {     String[] roles = request.paramAsStringArrayOrEmptyIfAll("name").     ClearRolesCacheRequest req = new ClearRolesCacheRequest().names(roles).     return channel -> new SecurityClient(client).clearRolesCache(req, new NodesResponseRestListener<>(channel)). }
